unittitle_ssm: Giovanni da Verrazzano letter transcription facsimiles
abstract_ssm: 1905 photographic facsimiles of an undated manuscript transcription of a 1524 letter from explorer Giovanni da Verrazzano to King Frances I of France upon Verrazzano's exploration of the Atlantic Coast of the United States, obtained from Florence, Italy by historian Arthur J. Weise for the Committee on Brooklyn History.
